execution_plan.description: Get the list of shipped order item IDs from the shipments system.
Find product IDs for the shipped order items (map shipped order_item_id -> product_id).
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT product_id, order_item_id FROM Order_Items WHERE order_item_id IN ($step1.order_item_id);

execution_plan.description: Optionally retrieve product details for the shipped product IDs (to enable counting distinct products or showing names).
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_id, product_name FROM Products WHERE product_id IN ($step2.product_id);
